TopicTitle: Hello to everyone in the forums!

Articles.Content:
Hello! my name is Alpha_star, and I  have just created my account yesterday. This is my first post in the KSP forums!

Although being new to the community, I am not (very) new to KSP, exceeding 300 hours of playtime in KSP1 with~200 hours in stock and ~100 hours in RSS+RO. I have done 14 Mun landings, 25Minmus landings, 2 Lunar landings and have already constructed several space stations around multiple celestial bodies.  However, I believe that I can do better by learning from the community,  which is my primary reason to join the forums.

Apart from that, I'd like to make some minor mods for KSP in order to make some contributions to the game and (hopefully) its community. I do not know much about modding, so it would be great if someone could teach me the basics! I have also played KSP2, which my computer could not really handle but still had fun, mostly because of the stunning graphics and music.

Hoping to see that the community can get better in the future!

(I am not from an English-speaking country, so my spelling and grammar could be wrong. Also, I'm new, so please be nice to me!)
Hey. Your English is fine.
Might be a bit dumb, but how do I change my icon? Would be glad to know.

1 hour ago, Alpha_star said:

Might be a bit dumb, but how do I change my icon? Would be glad to know.

You're not dumb at all, as a new member your first 5 posts outside of the lounge must be approved by a moderator before you can edit your profile or send personal messages. This is to protect the forum and the membership so we apologize for any inconvenience.
Glad to see you here mate, welcome

3 hours ago, pipe said:

Glad to see you here mate, welcome

Hello!

Edit: Sorry, I was wrong.

Edited August 28, 2023 by Alpha_star

Hey howdy!

Welcome aboard!

14 hours ago, Alpha_star said:

I'm new, so please be nice to me!

I hate newcomers who are already initiated and familiar with the dark magic of orbital mechanics. It strips every ounce of my authority, smugness and superiority complex... What the hell is internet for, if not precisely for satisfying those fantasies???
Welcome to the forums @Alpha_star!
Hi! Greetings from a true bad english speaker!
